name: Pofig
short_description:
Pofig - portable shell script that provides consistent unified interface to different standard UNIX tools. Pofig consolidated unified API for most portable tools in single wrapper script. Mostly it is targeted to developers.
Pofig script is expected to be usfull as part of project source build system. It can be run from Makefile instead of gcc. Pofig will guess itself what system you are on, what compiler to use and prepare correct parameters for a compiler.
Pofig is whitten in portable shell.
It can collect much information about host system. It can be run directly by user or used from script. Pofig unifies API for many standard tools.
